programme.title: Storage Wars: Auction Mayhem
programme.desc: Brandi, Jarrod, Darrell clash; Ivy battles; Mary, Renee give cold shoulder.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Barry's Best Buys
programme.desc: A collection of instances where Barry Weiss achieves storage-unit success by lending a helpful hand or teaming up with the competition.

programme.title: Storage Wars: Hollywood Hauls
programme.desc: Ivy races against time to score a locker and get home; Rene spends the most money of anyone, but it's Darrell and Brandon who paint their way to success; treasure hides in a locker far, far away; a locker contains antique Hollywood gold.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The buyers look for bargains in the Lake Highlands region of Dallas; Victor turns Bubba against Ricky; Mary bids against her former mentor.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: In Forth Worth, Jenny hopes to beat business rivals Ricky and Bubba at their own game; Victor offends the appraiser of his women's accessories; Moe and Mary take in a burlesque performance.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The bidders arrive in the Dallas suburb of Lancaster; Ricky and Bubba hope to stock up on furniture; Moe makes a risky purchase after returning from his Hawaiian vacation; Jenny's mother joins in the action.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Bubba plans to bid high against Victor; Jenny finds an item with stimulating properties; Mary and Moe plan a strategy; Ricky finds a collectible coin.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The auction action returns to Fort Worth; the home of Hell's Half Acre once again inspires hot blood and sharp tongues.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Ricky and Bubba take on a flea-market king in the city of Garland; Jenny and Mary discover an armory; Vic returns with a new protege.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Ricky and Bubba's nemesis resurfaces in the city of Mesquite; Jenny and Mary uncover a Cold War relic; a struggling Victor searches for bargains.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.sub-title: You Bought It, You Break It
programme.desc: The buyers return to Mesquite; Jenny battles a work-related injury; Moe and Mary's finds get them jumping and dancing.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The auction heads to Irving, Texas; Lesa and Moe go toe-to-toe for a unit with a mystical item; Victor flips a small locker for twenty-five times his initial investment; and Ricky and Bubba hit pay dirt with a locker containing sci-fi memorabilia.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Fort Worth, a perilous place in the 1800s, is a host to one more showdown when Matt moseys in and pushes his weight around.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Moe and Mary try to choose a team name; Victor wears camouflage hunting gear; Jenny battles with Mary over a unit with glass blowing items; Ricky and Bubba get a lesson on drugs.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The "Storage Wars" spread to the Lone Star state; the buyers have to be at the top of their game; like oil, these lockers look crude, but to the trained eye, they're as good as gold.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Victor hopes a return to the town of Waxahachie will stop his losing streak; Moe and Mary believe an antique instrument will yield big returns; Bubba and Ricky reel in a surprise.

programme.desc: Bubba returns to Killeen, Texas, where he attended high school; Victor unearths Civil War collectibles; Jenny attempts to crack a safe.
